title: randomly banned for no reason with no email
body: Hey whats up guys so I was taking break from playing league so  i took a nap so then when i woke up I WAS PERMANENTLY BANNED and i was very pissed because i didnt do anything wrong on this account and they just ban me out of the blue. so i go to check my email and guess what i dont even have a ban email. Im really mad right now that they just banned me like that out of the blue for no reason

replies.body:
Hey Suppanat,

Your account was locked because we detected some suspicious log-in activity.  Be sure to send a ticket to support and they'll be able to restore access for you!
This also happened to me. I browse the internet for like 3 hours and came back to my client and it said I got permanent banned for no reason. I also didn't get an email.

> [{quoted}](name=Ba choice ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sGZz71lp,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-09-24T03:20:53.338+0000)
>
> This also happened to me. I browse the internet for like 3 hours and came back to my client and it said I got permanent banned for no reason. I also didn't get an email.

no they told you why.... go read your post
Probably you had used 3rd party software or botting before. Thats why their system detect it and banned your account.

First, if you haven't done so already, make sure that it's the e-mail associated with the banned account, and also check the spam folder. If you still can't find the e-mail, then you can submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asking for the information regarding your ban.
